content: keep the leaf by romi-damelalata these fingerless gloves with a basic design will allow you to practice your skills with colorwork yarn garnstudio drops fabel 75% wool / 25 % polyamide 50g / 205m per ball 1 ball of color 100 natural main color and 1 ball of color 542 green contrasting color needles and notions -3mm / u s 2½ needle s of your preferred type for working small circumferences keep the leaf by romi- dame la lata - april 2021- page 1 -3 stitch markers 3 more if you want separate the repetitions of the chart -waste yarn for hold thumb stitches -tapestry needle -scissors gauge 33 sts and 32 rounds to 10cm / 4in over colorwork pattern in the round use 3mm / u s 2½ needle s as a starting point for swatching size to fit average adult hand with 18-20cm / 7-8in circumference chart notes read chart from right to left throughout i made a basic leaf chart and the instructions are given based on that but i have added a full chart at the end of the document with the repetitions and the thumb position included in case you prefer to work directly on that one pattern notes these mitts are worked from bottom to top after 2 5cm / 1in of 1x1 rib the colorwork body is worked following the leaf chart instructions the thumb stitches are worked from his own chart while continue with the leaf chart in the rest of the stitches then finish with 2 5cm / 1in of 1x1 rib for the hand and 1 5cm / ½in of 1x1 rib for the thumb abbreviations k knit p purl pm place marker sm slip marker m1r make one stitch to the right one stitch increased m1l make one stitch to the left one stitch increased measurements length from bottom to top 24cm / 9½in circumference of the palm 17 5cm / 7in length from bottom to the thumb 11cm / 4½in length of thumb 7cm / 2½in length from the end of the thumb to the top 8cm / 3in chart instructions 1 cast on work rib using long tail cast on or your preferred method and your main color cast on 56 sts pm and join for working in the round work 2 5cm / 1in about 10 rounds in 1x1 rib as follow keep the leaf by romi- dame la lata - april 2021- page 2 round 1 k1 p1 until end of round 2 mitt body join contrasting color and work round 1 of leaf chart working 14-stitch repeat 4 times around follow until round 21 3 insert thumb the 7th stitch of the first repetition will become the thumb so from round 22 to round 42 work as follows round 22 work the leaf chart until the 6th stitch pm work from the thumb chart pm continue with the 8th stitch from leaf chart repeat leaf chart 3 more time round 23 to 42 work
